verses.verse: אַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> After כֵ֗ן <WH3651> after that פָּתַ֤ח <WH6605> this opened אִיּוֹב֙ <WH347> Job אֶת־ <WH853> פִּ֔יהוּ <WH6310> his mouth וַיְקַלֵּ֖ל <WH7043> and cursed אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH3117> his day פ
וַיַּ֥עַן <WH6030> spake אִיּ֗וֹב <WH347> And Job וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said

יֹ֣אבַד <WH6> perish י֭וֹם <WH3117> Let the day אִוָּ֣לֶד <WH3205> wherein I was born בּ֑וֹ וְהַלַּ֥יְלָה <WH3915> and the night אָ֝מַ֗ר <WH559> [in which] it was said הֹ֣רָה <WH2030> conceive גָֽבֶר׃ <WH1397> There is a man child

הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> Let that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he יְֽהִ֫י <WH1961> become חֹ֥שֶׁךְ <WH2822> be darkness אַֽל־ <WH408> Nor יִדְרְשֵׁ֣הוּ <WH1875> regard אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> let not God מִמָּ֑עַל <WH4605> it from above וְאַל־ <WH408> Nor תּוֹפַ֖ע <WH3313> shine עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> and נְהָרָֽה׃ <WH5105> neither let the light

יִגְאָלֻ֡הוּ <WH1350> stain חֹ֣שֶׁךְ <WH2822> Let darkness וְ֭צַלְמָוֶת <WH6757> and the shadow of death תִּשְׁכָּן־ <WH7931> dwell עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> and עֲנָנָ֑ה <WH6053> it let a cloud יְ֝בַעֲתֻ֗הוּ <WH1204> terrify כִּֽמְרִ֥ירֵי <WH3650> upon it let the blackness יֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> of the day

הַלַּ֥יְלָה <WH3915> As [for] that night הַהוּא֮ <WH1931> he יִקָּחֵ֪ה֫וּ <WH3947> seize אֹ֥פֶל <WH652> let darkness אַל־ <WH408> nay יִ֭חַדְּ <WH2302> upon it let it not be joined בִּימֵ֣י <WH3117> unto the days שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> of the year בְּמִסְפַּ֥ר <WH4557> into the number יְ֝רָחִ֗ים <WH3391> of the months אַל־ <WH408> nay יָבֹֽא׃ <WH935> let it not come

הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold הַלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> Lo let that night הַ֭הוּא <WH1931> he יְהִ֣י <WH1961> become גַלְמ֑וּד <WH1565> be solitary אַל־ <WH408> no תָּבֹ֖א <WH935> come רְנָנָ֣ה <WH7445> let no joyful voice בֽוֹ׃
יִקְּבֻ֥הוּ <WH5344> Let them curse אֹרְרֵי־ <WH779> it that curse י֑וֹם <WH3117> the day הָ֝עֲתִידִ֗ים <WH6264> who are ready עֹרֵ֥ר <WH5782> to raise up לִוְיָתָֽן׃ <WH3882> their mourning

יֶחְשְׁכוּ֮ <WH2821> thereof be dark כּוֹכְבֵ֪י <WH3556> Let the stars נִ֫שְׁפּ֥וֹ <WH5399> of the twilight יְקַו־ <WH6960> let it look לְא֥וֹר <WH216> for light וָאַ֑יִן <WH369> have וְאַל־ <WH408> not יִ֝רְאֶ֗ה <WH7200> but [have] none neither let it see בְּעַפְעַפֵּי־ <WH6079> the dawning שָֽׁחַר׃ <WH7837> of the day

כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not סָ֭גַר <WH5462> Because it shut not up דַּלְתֵ֣י <WH1817> the doors בִטְנִ֑י <WH990> of my [mother's] womb וַיַּסְתֵּ֥ר <WH5641> nor hid עָ֝מָ֗ל <WH5999> sorrow מֵעֵינָֽי׃ <WH5869> from mine eyes
לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Why לֹּ֣א <WH3808> at מֵרֶ֣חֶם <WH7358> birth אָמ֑וּת <WH4191> Why died מִבֶּ֖טֶן <WH990> the womb יָצָ֣אתִי <WH3318> when I came out וְאֶגְוָֽע׃ <WH1478> die

מַ֭דּוּעַ <WH4069> Why קִדְּמ֣וּנִי <WH6923> prevent בִרְכָּ֑יִם <WH1290> Why did the knees וּמַה־ <WH4100> and why שָּׁ֝דַ֗יִם <WH7699> me? or why the breasts כִּ֣י <WH3588> should אִינָֽק׃ <WH3243> that I should suck

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For עַ֭תָּה <WH6258> now שָׁכַ֣בְתִּי <WH7901> For now should I have lain still וְאֶשְׁק֑וֹט <WH8252> and been quiet יָ֝שַׁ֗נְתִּי <WH3462> I should have slept אָ֤ז ׀ <WH227> then יָנ֬וּחַֽ <WH5117> then had I been at rest לִֽי׃
עִם־ <WH5973> With מְ֭לָכִים <WH4428> With kings וְיֹ֣עֲצֵי <WH3289> and counsellors אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth הַבֹּנִ֖ים <WH1129> which built חֳרָב֣וֹת <WH2723> desolate places לָֽמוֹ׃

א֣וֹ <WH176> Or עִם־ <WH5973> with שָׂ֭רִים <WH8269> Or with princes זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> that had gold לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> Who הַֽמְמַלְאִ֖ים <WH4390> who filled בָּתֵּיהֶ֣ם <WH1004> their houses כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> with silver

א֤וֹ <WH176> Or כְנֵ֣פֶל <WH5309> untimely birth טָ֭מוּן <WH2934> Or as an hidden לֹ֣א <WH3808> never אֶהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> not be As כְּ֝עֹלְלִ֗ים <WH5768> I had not been as infants לֹא־ <WH3808> never רָ֥אוּ <WH7200> [which] never saw אֽוֹר׃ <WH216> light

שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> There רְ֭שָׁעִים <WH7563> There the wicked חָ֣דְלוּ <WH2308> cease רֹ֑גֶז <WH7267> [from] troubling וְשָׁ֥ם <WH8033> and there יָ֝נ֗וּחוּ <WH5117> be at rest יְגִ֣יעֵי <WH3019> the weary כֹֽחַ׃ <WH3581> ability

יַ֭חַד <WH3162> together אֲסִירִ֣ים <WH615> [There] the prisoners שַׁאֲנָ֑נוּ <WH7599> rest לֹ֥א <WH3808> not שָׁ֝מְע֗וּ <WH8085> they hear ק֣וֹל <WH6963> not the voice נֹגֵֽשׂ׃ <WH5065> of the oppressor

קָטֹ֣ן <WH6996> The small וְ֭גָדוֹל <WH1419> and great שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> are there ה֑וּא <WH1931> he וְ֝עֶ֗בֶד <WH5650> are there and the servant חָפְשִׁ֥י <WH2670> [is] free מֵאֲדֹנָֽיו׃ <WH113> from his master

לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Why יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> given לְעָמֵ֣ל <WH6001> to him that is in misery א֑וֹר <WH216> Wherefore is light וְ֝חַיִּ֗ים <WH2416> and life לְמָ֣רֵי <WH4751> unto the bitter נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <WH5315> [in] soul

הַֽמְחַכִּ֣ים <WH2442> Which long לַמָּ֣וֶת <WH4194> for death וְאֵינֶ֑נּוּ <WH369> there וַֽ֝יַּחְפְּרֻ֗הוּ <WH2658> but it [cometh] not and dig מִמַּטְמוֹנִֽים׃ <WH4301> for it more than for hid treasures
הַשְּׂמֵחִ֥ים <WH8055> cheer up אֱלֵי־ <WH413> about גִ֑יל <WH1524> exceedingly יָ֝שִׂ֗ישׂוּ <WH7797> [and] are glad כִּ֣י <WH3588> when יִמְצְאוּ־ <WH4672> when they can find קָֽבֶר׃ <WH6913> grave

לְ֭גֶבֶר <WH1397> [Why is light given] to a man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whose דַּרְכּ֣וֹ <WH1870> whose way נִסְתָּ֑רָה <WH5641> is hid וַיָּ֖סֶךְ <WH5526> hath hedged in אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> and whom God בַּעֲדֽוֹ׃ <WH1157> about

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> at לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before לַ֭חְמִי <WH3899> I eat אַנְחָתִ֣י <WH585> For my sighing תָבֹ֑א <WH935> cometh וַֽיִּתְּכ֥וּ <WH5413> are poured out כַ֝מַּ֗יִם <WH4325> like the waters שַׁאֲגֹתָֽי׃ <WH7581> and my roarings

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For פַ֣חַד <WH6343> For the thing which I greatly פָּ֭חַדְתִּי <WH6342> feared וַיֶּאֱתָיֵ֑נִי <WH857> is come וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> and what יָ֝גֹ֗רְתִּי <WH3025> upon me and that which I was afraid יָ֣בֹא <WH935> of is come לִֽי׃

לֹ֤א <WH3808> nor שָׁלַ֨וְתִּי ׀ <WH7951> I was not in safety וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> nor שָׁקַ֥טְתִּי <WH8252> neither had I rest וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> nor נָ֗חְתִּי <WH5117> neither was I quiet וַיָּ֥בֹא <WH935> came רֹֽגֶז׃ <WH7267> yet trouble פ
